welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Istra, Russia, a charming city known for its rich history and stunning natural beauty. We invite you to explore our city and immerse yourself in its unique culture. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Sheremetyevo International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Sheremetyevo International Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Sheremetyevo International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Vnukovo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Vnukovo Airport, mostly used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Vnukovo Airport, primarily used for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
